name: claude-skills
description: Production-tested skills for SEO, security auditing, and web tools

plugins.name: LocalSEO
plugins.description: Local SEO audit, optimization, and automation for service businesses. Includes keyword research, competitor backlink analysis, GBP optimization, content briefs, and a full DIY automation system.

plugins.name: security-audit
plugins.description: Comprehensive cybersecurity audit framework following OWASP Top 10 and NIST 800-53. Red-team methodology for web application security review.

plugins.name: seo-review
plugins.description: Website SEO review covering technical SEO, on-page optimization, local search, Google Business Profile, structured data, and AI search readiness.

plugins.name: web-reader
plugins.description: Fetches web page content as clean markdown for analysis and processing.
